AppWebFeaturesSubTitle: Check out what you can do with this html data component viewer!

FeatureList.FeatureIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:100px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M12 18h.01M8 21h8a2 2 0 002-2V5a2 2 0 00-2-2H8a2 2 0 00-2 2v14a2 2 0 002 2z' /></svg>
FeatureList.FeatureInfo: Offline viewing of zipped html data apps. No hosting/domain required for viewing html components

FeatureList.FeatureIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:100px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M15 7a2 2 0 012 2m4 0a6 6 0 01-7.743 5.743L11 17H9v2H7v2H4a1 1 0 01-1-1v-2.586a1 1 0 01.293-.707l5.964-5.964A6 6 0 1121 9z' /></svg>
FeatureList.FeatureInfo: Secure viewing of html data apps containing supported file formats! All data is local to the device/runtime to ensure privacy

FeatureList.FeatureIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:100px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M19 11H5m14 0a2 2 0 012 2v6a2 2 0 01-2 2H5a2 2 0 01-2-2v-6a2 2 0 012-2m14 0V9a2 2 0 00-2-2M5 11V9a2 2 0 012-2m0 0V5a2 2 0 012-2h6a2 2 0 012 2v2M7 7h10' /></svg>
FeatureList.FeatureInfo: Privately share prototype html data apps using email / dropbox etc! Share Html Component Data as well as UI across Portable Runtimes

FeatureList.FeatureIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:100px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M9 3v2m6-2v2M9 19v2m6-2v2M5 9H3m2 6H3m18-6h-2m2 6h-2M7 19h10a2 2 0 002-2V7a2 2 0 00-2-2H7a2 2 0 00-2 2v10a2 2 0 002 2zM9 9h6v6H9V9z' /></svg>
FeatureList.FeatureInfo: The components viewer and runtime is available for Android/IOS, Web Server and Desktop platforms and will be developed in multiple languages
